column4: Date or timeframe when the assay was performed
The specific purpose of performing western blotting. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.
The title of the kit/biologicals used.
A category header for the detailed target protein information.
If not using Uniprot as protein ontology, please add the name of database and protein identifier.
The specific post-translational modifications being studied.
Type of gel used for protein separation. If it is not listed or it is a special mix, select "Other" and enter it in the next field.
A category header for the detailed antibody information below.
Full product name of the antibody. It could also includes target and modification state.
The company that supplied the antibody
The unique identifier assigned by the vendor for ordering the specific antibody product.
A category header for the secondary reagent used to visualize the primary antibody.
The commercial kit or chemical system used to generate the final signal.
The instrument or device used to capture the final signal.
A list of the checks performed to ensure the data is reliable.
Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.
(For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.
Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
